snippet.title: Take a rare look at the enormous mansions hidden behind the Hamptons' famously high hedges
snippet.content:
Beyond its beautiful beaches, bays, and lagoons, there's another type of eye candy that's native to the Hamptons: g orgeous, hidden real estate. Tucked at the end of snaking driveways, with huge shrubs blocking any chance of a roadside view, some of the East End's most breathtaking homes are rarely seen - at least, until now.
Aerial photographer Jeff Cully of captured the area's most exclusive enclaves and the mansions hidden within.
